subject: CONGRATULATIONS! You've Won a FREE BreezeLite Hairdryer!
body:
Dear Valued Customer,

Congratulations! Your email has been randomly selected as a GRAND PRIZE WINNER!

You have been chosen to receive a COMPLETELY FREE BreezeLite Premium Hairdryer worth $299!

To claim your prize, simply click the link below and verify your personal and payment information:

http://claim-your-free-hairdryer-now.suspicious-site.com

Offer valid for the next 24 HOURS ONLY!

Don't miss this incredible opportunity!

Best regards,
Lucky Draw Team
